main event: On March 14, 1952, a white elliptical object was observed for about 1.5 minutes, moving generally straight but curved slightly before fading from view.
interesting points: The object was approximately 500 yards away and appeared to be rotating as it moved,The sighting lasted for 1.5 minutes,The radar detected the object at a height of about 15,000 feet and a speed of approximately 500 knots,The object was tracked visually and on radar before it faded from view,This sighting is linked to multiple UFO reports from the Project Blue Book archives.
witness description: Air Force personnel observed the object using both visual and radar tracking.
